project.name: Overlays
project.description: The Gentoo Overlays team is responsible for the administration and long-term direction of the overlays.gentoo.org website.

p.b: What we do, and who we are

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Overlays team looks after overlays.gentoo.org. We work with infra to provide the service to Gentoo projects and developers. We create and administer individual overlays. We keep abreast of changes in the needs of anyone running an overlay, so that we can keep the service useful to everyone who wants to use it.

project.goals: Our goal is to provide a central home for overlays,
project.resource: Configure Apache To Work With PHP4 and PHP5

body.p: The best way to reach us is on IRC in the #gentoo-overlays channel on irc.freenode.net.
